title: Ama-arhus
extract:
Ama-arhus (Arad-Ama-arhus, Amat-Ama-arhus) is an Akkadian fertility goddess. She is mentioned in texts as being amongst the pantheon at Uruk in Hellenistic times, but is also found as an earlier aspect of the deity Gula.

References

  • Michael Jordan, Encyclopedia of Gods, Kyle Cathie Limited, 2002
